title: The speach of the Kirk of Scotland to her beloved children
author: Calderwood, David, 1575-1650.
notes: Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
British Library copy identified as STC 22040 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the originals in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 1197 (Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library copy) and at reel 1584 (British Library copy).
